duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the planning and implementation of a new Electronic Health Record system and transition from legacy RCM.
Work with executive leadership team, internal and external stakeholders, and selected vendor(s) to analyze, plan, and implement the clinical/laboratory components required for an Epic EHR system.
Manage the day-to-day activities for the assigned portion of the project and complete all input into overall EHR program reporting and the Project Portfolio Tool.
Set clear expectations for team members, coordinate activities, and ensure that the business community is engaged in the project.
Advise and coach team members, provide guidance on project issues, key success factors, and lessons learned.
Guide workflow design, build and test the system, and analyze technical issues associated with Epic software.
Maintain regular communication with Epic representatives, including participating in weekly project team meetings.
Participate in training and work with end users, reporting and reviewing the status of projects and issues on an ongoing basis.
Develop and maintain all required CIO and PMO project documentation in coordination with other EHR PMO PM resources.
